data.text:
📣 We are delighted to announce our Top Publisher Award winners for 2024. 🌎 In its 13th year, the awards celebrate the most successful mobile companies around the world. This year awarding over 400 companies across 45 markets. 💰 Our flagship Top Global Publishers by Consumer Spend ranks companies by their combined iOS and Google Play revenue estimates for 2023. 👀 This year, there are two new categories: Top Apps By Mobile Performance Score and Top Publishers By Mobile Performance Score. 🏆 These new categories recognize holistic performance in the mobile industry, in addition to revenue success. 📊 The 2024 Top Publisher Awards is made possible by more than 1.2 million apps categorized under data.ai’s industry-first Game IQ and App IQ taxonomy and data.ai’s applied ai-driven market data. 🏆 View the full list of winners - link below in comments. #toppublisherawards #mobilegaming #mobileapps

📱83.6% mobile 🖥 14.9% desktop 💻 1.5% tablet These are the Device Category numbers taken from our Google Analytics account this week across the Fanbase platform. In a world where the large (!) majority of fans are mobile-first and 55% of consumers say a frustrating checkout experience is enough to make them quit the process mid-transaction, it pays to be mobile-optimised. Here’s the revenue impact we’ve seen on Fanbase just with season ticket sales: ⬆️ £15k - West of Scotland League team ⬆️ £45k - National League South team ⬆️ £91k - Scottish Championship team Do you want to sell more tickets at your club? Make it easy to purchase on mobile. It’s not rocket science. Especially when you’re staring at the page of a provider who has: - the highest conversion rate on the market - the only native mobile app on the market - the fastest purchase experience on mobile Don’t miss out. Get in touch 😄

🩷 The time I matched both my presentation deck and conference decor 🙈😆 🎰 It’s been a month, but MAU Vegas was incredibly rewarding. 🔮 I discussed our latest mobile market forecast in 2030 - where the industry is headed and how we are going to get there. 📊 Some takeaways: 💰 The mobile app market is set to generate $288 billion annually in 2030 📱 Apps will overtake games in spending by 2030 at $145 Billion (50.3% share) 🇫🇷 France will experience the most growth in iOS consumer spend (11.4% CAGR) 🇧🇷 Brazil will experience the most growth for Google Play spend (also 11.4% CAGR) 📲 Downloads to hit 347 billion annually in 2030 🌏 Asia Pacific will account for 7 of every 10 downloads in 2030 📖 All these insights and more in a free report! 🔗 Link to full report in comments. 👏 Great work to Jonathan Briskman spearheading the first major forecast in the industry for many years! And dare I say the most detailed and robust yet! 🔥 And bringing it full circle to MAU - some other fantastic talks included John Koetsier , Peggy Anne Salz on numerous panels and the Mistplay team contributing on driving loyalty (Alivia Rasmussen Kyle West ) 📈 And more mobile and advertising insights to come - this time featuring Sensor Tower data! #forecast #mobile #trends #mauvegas

In the Q1 2024 edition of Singular's Quarterly Trends report, we've contributed data on trial conversion trends for subscription apps. Elsewhere in the report, there's plenty of interest — here are a few highlights 👇 💡 ATT opt-in on iOS dropped sharply 💡 CPI has jumped for most categories 💡 Meta, Google, TikTok, and Apple Search Ads gained the most new advertisers 💡 USA, UK, Canada, and Germany increased the most in ad spend 💡 Entertainment was the most popular app category on both Android and iOS 💡 Ad spend grew significantly on iOS, while web held steady Interesting reading for any app wishing to understand the latest user acquisition trends. 🔗 Access the full report: https://hubs.li/Q02whVCz0 #appgrowth #appmarketing

Adjust has just released its #mobileapp trends study for LATAM and we’d like to highlight some of its main findings. Take a look 👀 🌎 LATAM is one of the fastest-growing markets in the world. According to the study, Brazil and Mexico alone accounted for over 16 billion downloads in 2022. 🎮 Gaming 🎮 Chile has seen the most significant increase in installs for gaming apps so far this year, up 35% compared to the previous period. Meanwhile, Colombia has the highest gaming app session length. That is, the high-test retention, with over 27-minute sessions. 🛍️ Shopping 🛍️ Mexico has the highest install and app session rates of the whole LATAM area. Also, the study highlights that shopping apps see a substantial install surge in all of Latin America during Q4 - the holiday season -which is right around the corner. 🚀 If you want to aim your user acquisition strategies towards the LATAM market, we can help you. At AscendAd, we have the best strategies for gaming and shopping verticals in all GEOs to increase your installs and engagement. Let’s talk! And if you want to check out Adjust’s complete study, click here 👇🏻 https://lnkd.in/epX-5cvp #AscendAd #useracquisition #ROIgoals #ROAS

❗❗❗ Must-know: 💲💲💲 CEE Consumers downloaded 24 Million New Apps on Google Play in Q3 (+7% YoY) and spent close to a whooping $1Bn dollars on Google Play this year so far (+20% YoY). 🛍🛍🛍 Shopping has been the largest category in App downloads growth in CEE, way ahead of gaming and entertainment. I spoke about these data points and many other useful insights last week in my keynote at the opening of the CEE Apps Summit in Cyprus. Three main takeaways I wanted to leave the audience with: (1)The importance of apps in business has grown significantly in recent years, and this trend is expected to continue. This is due to the increasing use of mobile devices by CEE consumers, as well as the benefits that apps can offer businesses, such as increased customer engagement, loyalty, and profitability. (2) In addition, apps can be used to collect and utilize first-party data, which is becoming increasingly valuable in the digital age where compliance to user consent and responsibility are key. (3) Finally, AI-powered solutions can help businesses to promote their apps more effectively and reach a wider audience. #apps #cee #AI #google
